SELECT c.cno, c.cname, c.credit, d.dname, c.currentnum, c.maxnum, c.cintroduce, c.cterm FROM course c LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.tno = t.tno LEFT JOIN department d ON d.dno = c.dno WHERE t.tno = #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.cterm != #{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT DISTINCT c.cno, c.cname, credit, c.currentnum, c.maxnum, c.cterm, c.cintroduce, d.dno, d.dname, t.tno, t.tname FROM course c LEFT JOIN department d ON c.dno = d.dno LEFT JOIN teacher t ON t.tno = c.tno WHERE (d.dno = #{0,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR d.dno IS NULL) AND c.cterm = #{1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT distinct c.cno, c.cname, credit, c.currentnum, c.maxnum, c.cintroduce, c.cterm, d.dno, d.dname, t.tno, t.tname FROM course c LEFT JOIN department d ON c.dno = d.dno LEFT JOIN teacher t ON c.tno = t.tno WHERE (d.dno = #{dno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR d.dno IS NULL) AND c.cno NOT IN ( SELECT c.cno FROM student s JOIN stucourse sc ON s.sno = sc.sno JOIN course c ON sc.cno = c.cno LEFT JOIN department d ON d.dno = c.dno WHERE s.sno = #{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AND c.cterm = #{sterm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT c.cno, c.cname, c.credit, c.currentnum, c.maxnum, c.cintroduce, c.cterm, d.dname, d.dintroduce, t.tname, sc.score FROM student s JOIN stucourse sc ON s.sno = sc.sno JOIN course c ON sc.cno = c.cno LEFT JOIN teacher t ON t.tno = c.tno LEFT JOIN department d ON d.dno = c.dno WHERE s.sno = #{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.cterm = s.sterm

SELECT c.cno, c.cname, c.credit, c.currentnum, c.maxnum, c.cintroduce, c.cterm, d.dname, d.dintroduce, t.tname, sc.score FROM student s JOIN stucourse sc ON s.sno = sc.sno JOIN course c ON sc.cno = c.cno LEFT JOIN teacher t ON t.tno = c.tno LEFT JOIN department d ON d.dno = c.dno WHERE s.sno = #{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.cterm != s.sterm
SELECT sum(c.credit) AS credit FROM student s JOIN stucourse sc ON s.sno = sc.sno JOIN course c ON sc.cno = c.cno WHERE s.sno = #{sno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND c.cterm = s.sterm
